remarks: One of the conditions showing ` CH ` is an ortholattice.  (This corresponds to axiom "ax-r1" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
qlaxr1.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
qlaxr1.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
qlaxr1.3 $e |- A = B $.
qlaxr1i $p |- B = A $.
